infobox.Japanese Title:: 運命のブルーバースデー  (Unmei no Burū Bāsudē)
infobox.Cast:: Kaito Kuroba  Kaitou Kid  Aoko Nakamori  Ginzo Nakamori  Keiko Momoi  Snake  Sub-boss
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Kappei Yamaguchi as Kaito Kuroba, Kaitou Kid  Ayumi Fujimura as Aoko Nakamori  Unsho Ishizuka as Ginzo Nakamori  Ai Kayano as Keiko Momoi  Hochu Otsuka as Snake  Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Shozo Iizuka as Sub-boss  Toru Okawa as Director  Kenichi Miya as Policeman A  Kenji Akabane as Policeman B  Shusaku Shirakawa as Policeman C  Mizuki Nakamura as Policeman D  Umeka Shoji as Keiko's friend  Megumi Han as Keiko's second friend  Sayuri Hara as Keiko's third friend

sections.Characters introduced:
- Toichi Kuroba's murderer
- Criminal organization second-in-command
- Snake's superior
- Ekoda High student
- Aoko and Keiko's friend
sections.Story:
After a successful heist, Kid receives a phone call from a payphone and is told to stop stealing gems. At school, Kaito promises Aoko he will attend her birthday party, which is on the same day as his heist for the gem known as the Blue Birthday.
Kaito succeeds but is met by an organization and learns that they are the cause of his father's death.
sections.Manga to anime changes:
- In the manga, the string of flags that Kaito pulls out of his shirt pocket are all flags of various countries. To make the animation easier, the special changes this to flags with simple shapes like clovers and diamonds.
- The manga has only one scene that takes place during Aoko's birthday party proper. The special inserts a few more scenes of the party in-between the Blue Birthday heist, where Aoko's friends enjoy party games while Aoko herself wonders where Kaito is.
- In the manga, Kid throws the real Blue Birthday back immediately after dodging the gunfire from Snake and his cronies. In the special, he returns fire with his card-gun and disarms them before throwing the sapphire back.
- In the manga, Inspector Nakamori wonders if it's supposed to be "someone's birthday" when he finds the Blue Birthday. In the special, this line is moved to the Inspector's celebratory party.
- The epilogue featuring the boss of the organization contacting Spider is unique to the special.
